评论详情: Very comfortable and true to size.
These have very little adjustability.  I wasn't able to tighten them like I needed too.  Returned.

I've used minimalist shoes for 24 years and won't wear anything else.  At first I had trouble with this sandal hurting between my toes and the front catching and tripping me.  I committed myself to adjusting the straps to get the fit right.  Voila!  A dream.
The fit is great, and I love the look!

I tried to use to these gradually so my feet would get used to them. Unfortunately, these aren’t comfortable no matter how I adjust them. The adjustments across the middle will not stay in place. The toe strap hurts between my toes. I have been walking about 4 miles a day in these and my feet won’t adapt to them. The ball of my foot hurts after wearing them. I do like the way they look but not enough to keep them. Also, when the sandals get wet my foot slides around a lot and does not feel secure on my foot.
This is now my go-to summer athletic shoe. I can go straight from the trail to the rocks and into the water with these.
